name: Dreamscape (itch) (Aziz, Stormbornel)
description:
Dreamscape is a 3D platformer game where you need to go deeper into a trapped dream to find your way out.

This was created for the Ludum Dare 48 Game Jam!

Trapped in a Dream, you are required to gather Dream Essences to progress through your dream, and escape!

Jump on Switches, Talk to the beings in your mind, and most importantly... WAKE UP!

Controls:

[Mouse] Rotate Camera

[E] Interact

[WASD] Move Character

Credits: Aziz (Programming, Pixel Art) 

Stormborne (Level Design)
